summary: Marvel Studios' Captain Marvel - Official Trailer
title: Marvel Studios' Captain Marvel - Official Trailer
excerpt: Higher. Further. Faster. Watch the trailer for Marvel Studios’ Captain Marvel, in theaters March 8, 2019. ► Subscribe to Marvel: http://bit.ly/WeO3YJ More in...
description: In regards to Captain Marvel - This looks like a really solid trailer. Really glad that it looks like more Sam Jackson, but the real star here is Brie Larson. She looks amazing in this trailer! The music is pretty great too, and I’m excited for the Skrull involvement. That being said, kinda wish they didn’t show her punching the old woman. Might have been better to go in cold on that scene. Overall, might even see this in theaters.

reblog.comment: In regards to Captain Marvel - This looks like a really solid trailer. Really glad that it looks like more Sam Jackson, but the real star here is Brie Larson. She looks amazing in this trailer! The music is pretty great too, and I’m excited for the Skrull involvement. That being said, kinda wish they didn’t show her punching the old woman. Might have been better to go in cold on that scene. Overall, might even see this in theaters.

trail.content_raw: In regards to Captain Marvel - This looks like a really solid trailer. Really glad that it looks like more Sam Jackson, but the real star here is Brie Larson. She looks amazing in this trailer! The music is pretty great too, and I’m excited for the Skrull involvement. That being said, kinda wish they didn’t show her punching the old woman. Might have been better to go in cold on that scene. Overall, might even see this in theaters.
trail.content: In regards to Captain Marvel - This looks like a really solid trailer. Really glad that it looks like more Sam Jackson, but the real star here is Brie Larson. She looks amazing in this trailer! The music is pretty great too, and I’m excited for the Skrull involvement. That being said, kinda wish they didn’t show her punching the old woman. Might have been better to go in cold on that scene. Overall, might even see this in theaters.

summary: Zero Steps
title: Zero Steps
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2OGPkEs

by Rune_Mistress_of_Sharance

Johnny thought Spider-Man was nothing but a guy running around in spandex, until he changed his opinion… He’s annoying and only made things worse. Both opinions were created before he met Spider-Man properly.

And when Johnny finally meet and talk properly with the vigilante… Man, how wrong he was.
Pre!SpideyTorch

summary: Dad
title: Dad
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2QG4tre

by superfamily

**Inspired by a post by “Stark-Tony” on Tumblr**

Tony and Peter spent so much time together, sometimes to the point where Peter would slip up with the occasional, “Dad,” but it wasn’t until Tony referred to himself as such a thing where it pulls them closer together.

summary: Marvel Studios' Captain Marvel - Official Trailer
title: Marvel Studios' Captain Marvel - Official Trailer
excerpt: Higher. Further. Faster. Watch the trailer for Marvel Studios’ Captain Marvel, in theaters March 8, 2019. ► Subscribe to Marvel: http://bit.ly/WeO3YJ More in...
description:
The Captain Marvel trailer is here and I can’t keep it together. Holy shit it looks so good. 

I’ve waited 10 years for a standalone Marvel film with a female lead and Brie Larson being the one to do it makes it so, so good.

reblog.comment:
The Captain Marvel trailer is here and I can’t keep it together. Holy shit it looks so good. 

I’ve waited 10 years for a standalone Marvel film with a female lead and Brie Larson being the one to do it makes it so, so good.

The Captain Marvel trailer is here and I can’t keep it together. Holy shit it looks so good. 

I’ve waited 10 years for a standalone Marvel film with a female lead and Brie Larson being the one to do it makes it so, so good.

The Captain Marvel trailer is here and I can’t keep it together. Holy shit it looks so good. 

I’ve waited 10 years for a standalone Marvel film with a female lead and Brie Larson being the one to do it makes it so, so good.

summary: The thing that has me most shook about the Capitain Marvel trailer is her punching that old lady in the face. I assume that...
body: The thing that has me most shook about the Capitain Marvel trailer is her punching that old lady in the face. I assume that she’s likely not what she seems, but dang. That was a very jarring and disturbing visual, especially after the line “discover what makes a hero.” Odd editing choice.

reblog.comment: The thing that has me most shook about the Capitain Marvel trailer is her punching that old lady in the face. I assume that she’s likely not what she seems, but dang. That was a very jarring and disturbing visual, especially after the line “discover what makes a hero.” Odd editing choice.

trail.content_raw: The thing that has me most shook about the Capitain Marvel trailer is her punching that old lady in the face. I assume that she’s likely not what she seems, but dang. That was a very jarring and disturbing visual, especially after the line “discover what makes a hero.” Odd editing choice.
trail.content: The thing that has me most shook about the Capitain Marvel trailer is her punching that old lady in the face. I assume that she’s likely not what she seems, but dang. That was a very jarring and disturbing visual, especially after the line “discover what makes a hero.” Odd editing choice.
